verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Just one touch, of the hand of my Jesus,
dipped into the oil of the Holy Ghost,
it will sooth all my fears,
wipe away all my tears,
it's the annointing that I need the most.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus
Sweet, Sweet Annointing,
pouring down to make me clean,
like a mighty rushing stream, sweet,
sweet annointing, pouring out the oil and wine all over me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And now we lift our hands unto the father,
send forth rain upon this dry and thirsty land,
all my sins please forgive,
give me life that I might live,
let me feel the touch of your annointing hand.
